nodes.text: The Refugee Relief Coalition was a group founded by the Refugee Relief Movement to help with the refugees displaced by the Separatist Crisis. It included ten Mid Rim planets who relaxed their immigration laws.

The Refugee Relief Coalition was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the "Starship Fact File" department of the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 50, which was written by Tim Veekhoven.
